GK19bhakirpu:0: śriyaḥ kurūṇām adhipasya pālanīṃ prajāsu vṛttiṃ yam ayuṅkta veditum /
GK19bhakirpu:1: sa varṇiliṅgī viditaḥ samāyayau yudhiṣṭhiraṃ dvaitavane vanecaraḥ //
GK19bhakirpu:2: kṛtapraṇāmasya mahīṃ mahībhuje jitāṃ sapatnena nivedayiṣyataḥ /
GK19bhakirpu:3: na vivyathe tasya mano na hi priyaṃ pravaktum icchanti mṛṣā hitaiṣiṇaḥ //
GK19bhakirpu:4: dviṣāṃ vighātāya vidhātum icchato rahasy anujñām adhigamya bhūbhṛtaḥ /
GK19bhakirpu:5: sa sauṣṭhavaudāryaviśeṣaśālinīṃ viniścitārthām iti vācam ādadhe //
GK19bhakirpu:6: kriyāsu yuktair nṛpa cāracakṣuṣo na vañcanīyāḥ prabhavo 'nujīvibhiḥ /
GK19bhakirpu:7: ato 'rhasi kṣantum asādhu sādhu vā hitaṃ manohāri ca durlabhaṃ vacaḥ //
GK19bhakirpu:8: sa kiṃsakhā sādhu na śāsti yo 'dhipaṃ hitān na yaḥ saṃśṛṇute sa kiṃprabhuḥ
GK19bhakirpu:9: sadānukūleṣu hi kurvate ratiṃ nṛpeṣv amātyeṣu ca sarvasampadaḥ //
GK19bhakirpu:10: nisargadurbodham abodhaviklavāḥ kva bhūpatīnāṃ caritaṃ kva jantavaḥ /
GK19bhakirpu:11: tavānubhāvo 'yam abodhi yan mayā nigūḍhatattvaṃ nayavartma vidviṣām //
GK19bhakirpu:13: durodaracchadmajitāṃ samīhate nayena jetuṃ jagatīṃ suyodhanaḥ // BhKir_1.7
GK19bhakirpu:14: tathāpi jihmaḥ sa bhavajjigīṣayā tanoti śubhraṃ guṇasampadā yaśaḥ /
GK19bhakirpu:15: samunnayan bhūtim anāryasaṃgamād varaṃ virodho 'pi samaṃ mahātmabhiḥ //
GK19bhakirpu:17: vibhajya naktaṃdinam astatandriṇā vitanyate tena nayena pauruṣam //
GK19bhakirpu:18: sakhīn iva prītiyujo 'nujīvinaḥ samānamānān suhṛdaś ca bandhubhiḥ /
GK19bhakirpu:19: sa santataṃ darśayate gatasmayaḥ kṛtādhipatyām iva sādhu bandhutām //
GK19bhakirpu:20: asaktam ārādhayato yathāyathaṃ vibhajya bhaktyā samapakṣapātayā /
GK19bhakirpu:21: guṇānurāgād iva sakhyam īyivān na bādhate 'sya trigaṇaḥ parasparam //
GK19bhakirpu:22: niratyayaṃ sāma na dānavarjitaṃ na bhūri dānaṃ virahayya satkriyām /
GK19bhakirpu:23: pravartate tasya viśeṣaśālinī guṇānurodhena vinā na satkriyā // BhKir_1.12
GK19bhakirpu:24: vasūni vāñchan na vaśī na manyunā svadharma ity eva nivṛttakāraṇaḥ /
GK19bhakirpu:25: gurūpadiṣṭena ripau sute 'pi vā nihanti daṇḍena sa dharmaviplavam //
GK19bhakirpu:26: vidhāya rakṣān paritaḥ paretarān aśaṅkitākāram upaiti śaṅkitaḥ /
GK19bhakirpu:27: kriyāpavargeṣv anujīvisātkṛtāḥ kṛtajñatām asya vadanti sampadaḥ //
GK19bhakirpu:28: anārataṃ tena padeṣu lambhitā vibhajya samyag viniyogasatkriyām /
GK19bhakirpu:29: phalanty upāyāḥ paribṛṃhitāyatīr upetya saṃgharṣam ivārthasampadaḥ //
GK19bhakirpu:31: nayaty ayugmacchadagandhir ārdratāṃ bhṛśaṃ nṛpopāyanadantināṃ madaḥ //
GK19bhakirpu:32: sukhena labhyā dadhataḥ kṛṣīvalair akṛṣṭapacyā iva sasyasampadaḥ /
GK19bhakirpu:33: vitanvati kṣemam adevamātṛkāś cirāya tasmin kuravaś cakāsati // BhKir_1.17
GK19bhakirpu:34: mahaujaso mānadhanā dhanārcitā dhanurbhṛtaḥ saṃyati labdhakīrtayaḥ /
GK19bhakirpu:35: na saṃhatās tasya na bhedavṛttayaḥ priyāṇi vāñchanty asubhiḥ samīhitum //
GK19bhakirpu:37: svayaṃ pradugdhe 'sya guṇair upasnutā vasūpamānasya vasūni medinī //
GK19bhakirpu:38: mahībhujāṃ saccaritaiś caraiḥ kriyāḥ sa veda niḥśesam aśeṣitakriyaḥ /
GK19bhakirpu:39: mahodayais tasya hitānubandhibhiḥ pratīyate dhātur ivehitaṃ phalaiḥ //
GK19bhakirpu:40: na tena sajyaṃ kvacid udyataṃ dhanur na vā kṛtaṃ kopavijihmam ānanam /
GK19bhakirpu:41: guṇānurāgeṇa śirobhir uhyate narādhipair mālyam ivāsya śāsanam //
GK19bhakirpu:42: sa yauvarājye navayauvanoddhataṃ nidhāya duḥśāsanam iddhaśāsanaḥ /
GK19bhakirpu:43: makheṣv akhinno 'numataḥ purodhasā dhinoti havyena hiraṇyaretasam //
GK19bhakirpu:44: pralīnabhūpālam api sthirāyati praśāsad āvāridhi maṇḍalaṃ bhuvaḥ /
GK19bhakirpu:45: sa cintayaty eva bhiyas tvad eṣyatīr aho durantā balavadvirodhitā //
GK19bhakirpu:47: tavābhidhānād vyathate natānanaḥ sa duḥsahān mantrapadād ivoragaḥ //
GK19bhakirpu:48: tad āśu kartuṃ tvayi jihmam udyate vidhīyatāṃ tatra vidheyam uttaram /
GK19bhakirpu:49: parapraṇītāni vacāṃsi cinvatāṃ pravṛttisārāḥ khalu mādṛśāṃ dhiyaḥ //
GK19bhakirpu:50: itīrayitvā giram āttasatkriye gate 'tha patyau vanasaṃnivāsinām /
GK19bhakirpu:51: praviśya kṛṣṇā sadanaṃ mahībhujā tad ācacakṣe 'nujasannidhau vacaḥ //
GK19bhakirpu:52: niśamya siddhiṃ dviṣatām apākṛtīs tatas tatastyā viniyantum akṣamā /
GK19bhakirpu:53: nṛpasya manyuvyavasāyadīpinīr udājahāra drupadātmajā giraḥ // BhKir_1.27
GK19bhakirpu:55: tathāpi vaktuṃ vyavasāyayanti māṃ nirastanārīsamayā durādhayaḥ //
GK19bhakirpu:56: akhaṇḍam ākhaṇḍalatulyadhāmabhiś ciraṃ dhṛtā bhūpatibhiḥ svavaṃśajaiḥ /
GK19bhakirpu:57: tvayā svahastena mahī madacyutā mataṅgajena srag ivāpavarjitā //
GK19bhakirpu:58: vrajanti te mūḍhadhiyaḥ parābhavaṃ bhavanti māyāviṣu ye na māyinaḥ /
GK19bhakirpu:59: praviśya hi ghnanti śaṭhās tathāvidhān asaṃvṛtāṅgān niśitā iveṣavaḥ //
GK19bhakirpu:61: parais tvadanyaḥ ka ivāpahārayen manoramām ātmavadhūm iva śriyam //
GK19bhakirpu:62: bhavantam etarhi manasvigarhite vivartamānaṃ naradeva vartmani /
GK19bhakirpu:63: kathaṃ na manyur jvalayaty udīritaḥ śamītaruṃ śuṣkam ivāgnir ucchikhaḥ //
GK19bhakirpu:64: avandhyakopasya nihantur āpadāṃ bhavanti vaśyāḥ svayam eva dehinaḥ /
GK19bhakirpu:65: amarṣaśūnyena janasya jantunā na jātahārdena na vidviṣādaraḥ // BhKir_1.33
GK19bhakirpu:67: mahārathaḥ satyadhanasya mānasaṃ dunoti te kaccid ayaṃ vṛkodaraḥ //
GK19bhakirpu:68: vijitya yaḥ prājyam ayacchad uttarān kurūn akupyaṃ vasu vāsavopamaḥ /
GK19bhakirpu:69: sa valkavāsāṃsi tavādhunāharan karoti manyuṃ na kathaṃ dhanaṃjayaḥ //
GK19bhakirpu:71: kathaṃ tvam etau dhṛtisaṃyamau yamau vilokayann utsahase na bādhitum //
GK19bhakirpu:72: imām ahaṃ veda na tāvakīṃ dhiyaṃ vicitrarūpāḥ khalu cittavṛttayaḥ /
GK19bhakirpu:73: vicintayantyā bhavadāpadaṃ parāṃ rujanti cetaḥ prasabhaṃ mamādhayaḥ //
GK19bhakirpu:74: purādhirūḍhaḥ śayanaṃ mahādhanaṃ vibodhyase yaḥ stutigītimaṅgalaiḥ /
GK19bhakirpu:75: adabhradarbhām adhiśayya sa sthalīṃ jahāsi nidrām aśivaiḥ śivārutaiḥ //
GK19bhakirpu:76: puropanītaṃ nṛpa rāmaṇīyakaṃ dvijātiśeṣeṇa yad etad andhasā /
GK19bhakirpu:77: tad adya te vanyaphalāśinaḥ paraṃ paraiti kārśyaṃ yaśasā samaṃ vapuḥ //
GK19bhakirpu:78: anārataṃ yau maṇipīṭhaśāyināv arañjayad rājaśiraḥsrajāṃ rajaḥ /
GK19bhakirpu:79: niṣīdatas tau caraṇau vaneṣu te mṛgadvijālūnaśikheṣu barhiṣām //
GK19bhakirpu:80: dviṣannimittā yad iyaṃ daśā tataḥ samūlam unmūlayatīva me manaḥ /
GK19bhakirpu:81: parair aparyāsitavīryasampadāṃ parābhavo 'py utsava eva māninām //
GK19bhakirpu:82: vihāya śāntiṃ nṛpa dhāma tat punaḥ prasīda saṃdhehi vadhāya vidviṣām /
GK19bhakirpu:83: vrajanti śatrūn avadhūya niḥspṛhāḥ śamena siddhiṃ munayo na bhūbhṛtaḥ //
GK19bhakirpu:84: puraḥsarā dhāmavatāṃ yaśodhanāḥ suduḥsahaṃ prāpya nikāram īdṛśam /
GK19bhakirpu:85: bhavādṛśāś ced adhikurvate parān nirāśrayā hanta hatā manasvitā //
GK19bhakirpu:86: atha kṣamām eva nirastasādhanaś cirāya paryeṣi sukhasya sādhanam /
GK19bhakirpu:87: vihāya lakṣmīpatilakṣma kārmukaṃ jaṭādharaḥ sañ juhudhīha pāvakam //
GK19bhakirpu:88: na samayaparirakṣaṇaṃ kṣamaṃ te nikṛtipareṣu pareṣu bhūridhāmnaḥ /
GK19bhakirpu:89: ariṣu hi vijayārthinaḥ kṣitīśā vidadhati sopadhi saṃdhidūṣaṇāni //
GK19bhakirpu:90: vidhisamayaniyogād dīptisaṃhārajihmaṃ śithilabalam agādhe magnam āpatpayodhau /
GK19bhakirpu:91: riputimiram udasyodīyamānaṃ dinādau dinakṛtam iva lakṣmīs tvāṃ samabhyetu bhūyaḥ // BhKir_1.46
GK19bhakirpu:92: vihitāṃ priyayā manaḥpriyām atha niścitya giraṃ garīyasīm /
GK19bhakirpu:93: upapattimad ūrjitāśrayaṃ nṛpam ūce vacanaṃ vṛkodaraḥ // BhKir_2.1 //
GK19bhakirpu:94: yad avocata vīkṣya māninī paritaḥ snehamayena cakṣuṣā /
GK19bhakirpu:95: api vāgadhipasya durvacaṃ vacanaṃ tad vidadhīta vismayam // BhKir_2.2 //
GK19bhakirpu:96: viṣamo 'pi vigāhyate nayaḥ kṛtatīrthaḥ payasām ivāśayaḥ /
GK19bhakirpu:97: sa tu tatra viśeṣadurlabhaḥ sad upanyasyati kṛtyavartma yaḥ // BhKir_2.3
GK19bhakirpu:99: ativīryavatīva bheṣaje bahur alpīyasi dṛśyate guṇaḥ // BhKir_2.4 //
GK19bhakirpu:100: iyam iṣṭaguṇāya rocatāṃ rucirārthā bhavate 'pi bhāratī /
GK19bhakirpu:101: nanu vaktṛviśeṣaniḥspṛhā guṇagṛhyā vacane vipaścitaḥ // BhKir_2.5 //
GK19bhakirpu:102: catasṛṣv api te vivekinī nṛpa vidyāsu nirūḍhim āgatā /
GK19bhakirpu:103: katham etya matir viparyayaṃ kariṇī paṅkam ivāvasīdati // BhKir_2.6 //
GK19bhakirpu:104: vidhuraṃ kim ataḥ paraṃ parair avagītāṃ gamite daśām imām /
GK19bhakirpu:105: avasīdati yat surair api tvayi sambhāvitavṛtti pauruṣam // BhKir_2.7 //
GK19bhakirpu:106: dviṣatām udayaḥ sumedhasā gurur asvantataraḥ sumarṣaṇaḥ /
GK19bhakirpu:107: na mahān api bhūtim icchatā phalasampatpravaṇaḥ parikṣayaḥ // BhKir_2.8 //
GK19bhakirpu:108: acireṇa parasya bhūyasīṃ viparītāṃ vigaṇayya cātmanaḥ /
GK19bhakirpu:109: kṣayayuktim upekṣate kṛtī kurute tatpratikāram anyathā // BhKir_2.9 //
GK19bhakirpu:111: apayānty acirān mahībhujāṃ jananirvādabhayād iva śriyaḥ // BhKir_2.10 //
GK19bhakirpu:112: kṣayayuktam api svabhāvajaṃ dadhataṃ dhāma śivaṃ samṛddhaye /
GK19bhakirpu:113: praṇamanty anapāyam utthitaṃ pratipaccandram iva prajā nṛpam // BhKir_2.11
GK19bhakirpu:115: sa vidheyapadeṣu dakṣatāṃ niyatiṃ loka ivānurudhyate // BhKir_2.12 //
GK19bhakirpu:116: abhimānavato manasvinaḥ priyam uccaiḥ padam ārurukṣataḥ /
GK19bhakirpu:119: niyatā laghutā nirāyater agarīyān na padaṃ nṛpaśriyaḥ // BhKir_2.14 //
GK19bhakirpu:120: tad alaṃ pratipakṣam unnater avalambya vyavasāyavandhyatām /
GK19bhakirpu:121: nivasanti parākramāśrayā na viṣādena samaṃ samṛddhayaḥ // BhKir_2.15 //
GK19bhakirpu:122: atha ced avadhiḥ pratīkṣyate katham āviṣkṛtajihmavṛttinā /
GK19bhakirpu:123: dhṛtarāṣṭrasutena sutyajyāś ciram āsvādya narendrasampadaḥ // BhKir_2.16
GK19bhakirpu:124: dviṣatā vihitaṃ tvayāthavā yadi labdhā punar ātmanaḥ padam /
GK19bhakirpu:125: jananātha tavānujanmanāṃ kṛtam āviṣkṛtapauruṣair bhujaiḥ // BhKir_2.17 //
GK19bhakirpu:126: madasiktamukhair mṛgādhipaḥ karibhir vartayati svayaṃ hataiḥ /
GK19bhakirpu:127: laghayan khalu tejasā jagan na mahān icchati bhūtim anyataḥ // BhKir_2.18
GK19bhakirpu:128: abhimānadhanasya gatvarair asubhiḥ sthāsnu yaśaś cicīṣataḥ /
GK19bhakirpu:129: acirāṃśuvilāsacañcalā nanu lakṣmīḥ phalam ānuṣaṅgikam // BhKir_2.19 //
GK19bhakirpu:130: jvalitaṃ na hiraṇyaretasaṃ cayam āskandati bhasmanāṃ janaḥ /
GK19bhakirpu:131: abhibhūtibhayād asūn ataḥ sukham ujjhanti na dhāma māninaḥ // BhKir_2.20
GK19bhakirpu:132: kim avekṣya phalaṃ payodharān dhvanataḥ prārthayate mṛgādhipaḥ /
GK19bhakirpu:133: prakṛtiḥ khalu sā mahīyasaḥ sahate nānyasamunnatiṃ yayā // BhKir_2.21 //
GK19bhakirpu:134: kuru tan matim eva vikrame nṛpa nirdhūya tamaḥ pramādajam /
GK19bhakirpu:135: dhruvam etad avehi vidviṣāṃ tvadanutsāhahatā vipattayaḥ // BhKir_2.22 //
GK19bhakirpu:136: dviradān iva digvibhāvitāṃś caturas toyanidhīn ivāyataḥ /
GK19bhakirpu:137: prasaheta raṇe tavānujān dviṣatāṃ kaḥ śatamanyutejasaḥ // BhKir_2.23 //
GK19bhakirpu:138: jvalatas tava jātavedasaḥ satataṃ vairikṛtasya cetasi /
GK19bhakirpu:141: upasāntvayituṃ mahīpatir dviradaṃ duṣṭam ivopacakrame // BhKir_2.25 //
GK19bhakirpu:143: vimalā tava vistare girāṃ matir ādarśa ivābhidṛśyate // BhKir_2.26 //
GK19bhakirpu:144: sphuṭatā na padair apākṛtā na ca na svīkṛtam arthagauravam /
GK19bhakirpu:145: racitā pṛthagarthatā girāṃ na ca sāmarthyam apohitaṃ kvacit // BhKir_2.27
GK19bhakirpu:146: upapattir udāhṛtā balād anumānena na cāgamaḥ kṣataḥ /
GK19bhakirpu:147: idam īdṛg anīdṛgāśayaḥ prasabhaṃ vaktum upakrameta kaḥ // BhKir_2.28 //
GK19bhakirpu:148: avitṛptatayā tathāpi me hṛdayaṃ nirṇayam eva dhāvati /
GK19bhakirpu:149: avasāyayituṃ kṣamāḥ sukhaṃ na vidheyeṣu viśeṣasampadaḥ // BhKir_2.29 //
GK19bhakirpu:150: sahasā vidadhīta na kriyām avivekaḥ param āpadāṃ padam /
GK19bhakirpu:151: vṛṇate hi vimṛśyakāriṇaṃ guṇalubdhāḥ svayam eva sampadaḥ // BhKir_2.30 //
GK19bhakirpu:153: sa sadā phalaśālinīṃ kriyāṃ śaradaṃ loka ivādhitiṣṭhati // BhKir_2.31 //
GK19bhakirpu:154: śuci bhūṣayati śrutaṃ vapuḥ praśamas tasya bhavaty alaṃkriyā /
GK19bhakirpu:157: sukṛtaḥ pariśuddha āgamaḥ kurute dīpa ivārthadarśanam // BhKir_2.33 //
GK19bhakirpu:158: spṛhaṇīyaguṇair mahātmabhiś carite vartmani yacchatāṃ manaḥ /
GK19bhakirpu:159: vidhihetur ahetur āgasāṃ vinipāto 'pi samaḥ samunnateḥ // BhKir_2.34 //
GK19bhakirpu:161: vigaṇayya nayanti pauruṣaṃ vijitakrodharayā jigīṣavaḥ // BhKir_2.35 //
GK19bhakirpu:162: apaneyam udetum icchatā timiraṃ roṣamayaṃ dhiyā puraḥ /
GK19bhakirpu:163: avibhidya niśākṛtaṃ tamaḥ prabhayā nāṃśumatāpy udīyate // BhKir_2.36 //
GK19bhakirpu:164: balavān api kopajanmanas tamaso nābhibhavaṃ ruṇaddhi yaḥ /
GK19bhakirpu:165: kṣayapakṣa ivaindavīḥ kalāḥ sakalā hanti sa śaktisampadaḥ // BhKir_2.37 //
GK19bhakirpu:166: samavṛttir upaiti mārdavaṃ samaye yaś ca tanoti tigmatām /
GK19bhakirpu:167: adhitiṣṭhati lokam ojasā sa vivasvān iva medinīpatiḥ // BhKir_2.38 //
GK19bhakirpu:168: kva cirāya parigrahaḥ śriyāṃ kva ca duṣṭendriyavājivaśyatā /
GK19bhakirpu:169: śaradabhracalāś calendriyair asurakṣā hi bahucchalāḥ śriyaḥ // BhKir_2.39
GK19bhakirpu:170: kim asāmayikaṃ vitanvatā manasaḥ kṣobham upāttaraṃhasaḥ /
GK19bhakirpu:171: kriyate patir uccakair apāṃ bhavatā dhīratayādharīkṛtaḥ // BhKir_2.40 //
GK19bhakirpu:172: śrutam apy adhigamya ye ripūn vinayante sma na śarīrajanmanaḥ /
GK19bhakirpu:173: janayanty acirāya sampadām ayaśas te khalu cāpalāśrayam // BhKir_2.41 //
GK19bhakirpu:175: janavan na bhavantam akṣamā nayasiddher apanetum arhati // BhKir_2.42 //
GK19bhakirpu:176: upakārakam āyater bhṛśaṃ prasavaḥ karmaphalasya bhūriṇaḥ /
GK19bhakirpu:177: anapāyi nibarhaṇaṃ dviṣāṃ na titikṣāsamam asti sādhanam // BhKir_2.43 //
GK19bhakirpu:179: praṇamanti sadā suyodhanaṃ prathame mānabhṛtāṃ na vṛṣṇayaḥ // BhKir_2.44
GK19bhakirpu:180: suhṛdaḥ sahajās tathetare matam eṣāṃ na vilaṅghayanti ye /
GK19bhakirpu:181: vinayād iva yāpayanti te dhṛtarāṣṭrātmajam ātmasiddhaye // BhKir_2.45 //
GK19bhakirpu:182: abhiyoga imān mahībhujo bhavatā tasya tataḥ kṛtāvadheḥ /
GK19bhakirpu:183: pravighāṭayitā samutpatan haridaśvaḥ kamalākarān iva // BhKir_2.46 //
GK19bhakirpu:184: upajāpasahān vilaṅghayan sa vidhātā nṛpatīn madoddhataḥ /
